title: Artificial Intelligence for Medical Technology
excerpt: Small and medium medical-technology enterprises (SME) in Baden WÃ¼rttemberg are set to soon use artifical intelligence (AI) methods for the improvement and new development of their products. The expertise for this has been provided by the Project Group for Automation in Medicine and Biotechnology (PAMB) at Fraunhofer IPA and the Application Center for Intelligent Machines in Medical Technology (ANIMMED) at Mannheim University Hospital.
